title: Ham and Cheddar Sous Vide Egg Bites

Ingredients.2: 3 tablespoons coconut oil, or as needed

Directions.1: Fill a stockpot with enough water to just cover the jars. Attach a sous vide immersion cooker to the side of the pot. Set temperature to 172 degrees F (77 degrees C).

Directions.2: Generously oil the inside of each jar with coconut oil. Add ham and red pepper to the bottom of the jars.

Directions.3: Whisk eggs and cream together in a bowl until well combined. Stir in Cheddar cheese, salt, and nutmeg. Divide egg mixture among the jars. Close jars with lids and metal bands; tighten using the tips of your fingers only. Do not over-tighten.

Directions.4: Immerse in the water bath and cook for 1 hour. Carefully remove the jars, using tongs, to a heat-resistant surface. Let rest 10 minutes before opening the jars.
